validationPatterns.validatePasswordLength: Password must have at least 8 characters
validationPatterns.passwordContainsNumericCharacters: Password must have at least 1 numeric characters
validationPatterns.passwordContainsUpperCaseCharacter: Password must have at least 1 uppercase alphabetical character
validationPatterns.passwordContainsLowerCaseCharacter: Password must have at least 1 lowercase alphabetical character
validationPatterns.validateUsernameLength: Username must have at least 5 characters
validationPatterns.validateOrganizationSlug: Only Latin characters and numbers are allowed
validationPatterns.validatePhoneNumber: Input phone number is not correct

search.description: To get started with your annotation project
search.description_cloud_storage: To get started with your cloud storage

cannot-connect-server.title: Cannot connect to the server
cannot-connect-server.content:
Make sure the CVAT backend and all necessary services
(Database, Redis and Open Policy Agent) are running and available.
If you upgraded from version 2.2.0 or earlier, manual actions may be needed,
see the <1>Upgrade Guide.

unsupported-platform.title: Unsupported platform detected
content:
The browser you are using is {{name}} {{version}} based on {{engine}}.
CVAT was tested in the latest versions of Chrome and Firefox.
We recommend to use Chrome (or another Chromium based browser)

unsupported-features.title: Unsupported features detected
unsupported-features.content:
{{name}} v{{version}} does not support API, which is used by CVAT.
It is strongly recommended to update your browser.
